CustomField.description: Used as merge fields in email template
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Account.IsPersonAccount, text(Account.Salutation)<>"" ), CASE(text(Account.Salutation), "Mr.", "Monsieur " + Account.LastName, "Mrs.", "Madame " + Account.LastName, "Ms.", "Madame " + Account.LastName, ""), "Bonjour " + Account.FirstName + " " + Account.LastName )
CustomField.label: Salutation FRA Email Body
